title: News24.com | Coronavirus threat akin to a wartime situation, says DA as it welcomes lockdown
description: The DA has welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa's announcement of a nationwide lockdown, saying Covid-19 is "the biggest threat our country has faced in its 26 years of democracy".
content:
The DA has welcomed President Cyril Ramaphosa's announcement of a nationwide lockdown, saying Covid-19 is "the biggest threat our country has faced in its 26 years of democracy".
On Monday, Ramaphosa announced additional, stricter measures to combat the viru… [+1949 chars]
